markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Forgotten Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3766) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 65</row>

</column>

---

The world conspires to keep you forgotten and unnoticed— memories cloud, ink stains out your name in ledgers, and portraits of you crack and warp over your face. Characters attempting to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about you take a –2 circumstance penalty. Add [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) to your spell list as a primal spell.
name: Forgotten Presence
